date.description: date of the transaction (when the user pays the ticket)

bookingStartDate.description: datetime when the reservation of the parking starts

bookingEndDate.description: datetime when the reservation of the parking ends

paidMinutes.description: number of minutes of the reservation into the payment periods

freeMinutes.description: number of minutes of the reservation that are free of charge

rate.description: rate type applied to the reservation

customerPlate.description: license plate of the car when applicable

customerName.description: name of the customer when applicable

customerPhone.description: phone of the customer when applicable

customerType.description: type of registered user when applicable

ticketNumber.description: number of the ticket of the transaction

paymentMethod.description: method of payment, for example, credit card

totalMinutes.description: total of minuted of the reservation (from the starting date to the end date)
